                  GUI_CalcColorDist PROC
;;;62     */
;;;63     U32 GUI_CalcColorDist (LCD_COLOR PalColor, LCD_COLOR  Color) {
000000  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;64     /* This routine does not use abs() because we are optimizing for speed ! */
;;;65       I16 Dist;
;;;66       U32 Sum;
;;;67       Dist  = (PalColor&0xff) - (Color&0xff);
000002  b2cb              UXTB     r3,r1
000004  1ad2              SUBS     r2,r2,r3
;;;68       if (Dist < 0)
000006  2a00              CMP      r2,#0
000008  da01              BGE      |L1.14|
;;;69     	  Dist = -Dist;
00000a  4252              RSBS     r2,r2,#0
00000c  b212              SXTH     r2,r2
                  |L1.14|
;;;70       Sum = SQUARE(Dist);
00000e  b292              UXTH     r2,r2
000010  fb02f302          MUL      r3,r2,r2
;;;71       Dist  = ((PalColor>>8)&0xff) -  ((Color>>8)&0xff);
000014  f3c02207          UBFX     r2,r0,#8,#8
000018  f3c12c07          UBFX     r12,r1,#8,#8
00001c  eba2020c          SUB      r2,r2,r12
;;;72       if (Dist < 0)
000020  2a00              CMP      r2,#0
000022  da01              BGE      |L1.40|
;;;73     	  Dist = -Dist;
000024  4252              RSBS     r2,r2,#0
000026  b212              SXTH     r2,r2
                  |L1.40|
;;;74       Sum += SQUARE(Dist);
000028  b292              UXTH     r2,r2
00002a  fb023202          MLA      r2,r2,r2,r3
;;;75       Dist  = (PalColor>>16) - (Color>>16);
00002e  0c00              LSRS     r0,r0,#16
000030  eba04011          SUB      r0,r0,r1,LSR #16
000034  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
;;;76       if (Dist < 0)
000036  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000038  da01              BGE      |L1.62|
;;;77     	  Dist = -Dist;
00003a  4240              RSBS     r0,r0,#0
00003c  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.62|
;;;78       return Sum + SQUARE(Dist);
00003e  b280              UXTH     r0,r0
000040  fb002000          MLA      r0,r0,r0,r2
;;;79     }
000044  4770              BX       lr
;;;80     
                          ENDP
